data.text: “Ke azɔ la, Hiob, ɖo to nye nyawo,
Kpɔ ɖa, mele nye nu ke ge
Nye nyawo tso dzi vavã me
Mawu ƒe gbɔgbɔe wɔm,
eya ta ɖo nya ŋu nam, ne àte ŋui,
Ɖeko mele abe wò ene le Mawu ŋkume,
Vɔvɔ̃ nam megado dzikatsoƒo na wò
“Gake ègblɔ wòge ɖe nye to me
‘Medza eye nu vɔ̃ mele ŋutinye o,
Ke hã la, Mawu kpɔ vodada le ŋunye,
Etsɔ nye afɔ de kunyowu me
“Gake magblɔe na wo be,
Nu ka ŋutie nèle nya hem kplii be,
Elabena Mawu ƒoa nu to mɔ sia alo ekemɛ dzi
Le drɔ̃e me, le zã me ƒe ŋutega me,
ava ƒo nu ɖe to me na wo,
be wòana amegbetɔ natrɔ tso vɔ̃wɔwɔ me
ne wòadzra eƒe luʋɔ ɖo tso yɔdo ƒe asi me
“Alo eƒoa ame le dɔbadzi
ale be eya ameti bliboa nyɔa ŋu nuɖuɖu
Eƒe ŋutilã vɔ le eme eye eƒe ƒu siwo ŋu
Eƒe luʋɔ te ɖe yɔdo ŋu kpokploe,
Ke hã la, ne Mawudɔla le eƒe axadzi abe nyaxɔɖeakɔla ene,
heve enu, gblɔ nɛ be,
tete eƒe ŋutilã zua yeye abe ɖevi tɔ ene
Edoa gbe ɖa na Mawu
Tete wòvaa amewo gbɔ, gblɔna be,
Eɖe nye agbe tso yɔdomeyiyi me,
“Mawu wɔa nu siawo katã na ame,
be wòaɖe eƒe luʋɔ tso tsiẽƒe,
“Ƒu to anyi, Hiob, ne nàɖo tom,
Ne nya aɖe le asiwò la, ɖo nya ŋu nam,
Gake ne mele eme o la, ekema nàɖo tom,
